import { useParams, Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Form, Button, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { addToCart, removeFromCart } from '../slices/cartSlice' import { FaTrash } from 'react-icons/fa' import Message from '../components/Message' const CartScreen = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() const dispatch = useDispatch() const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart) const { cartItems } = cart const addToCartHandler = async (product, qty) => { dispatch(addToCart({ ...product, qty })) } const removeFromCartHandler = async (id) => { dispatch(removeFromCart(id)) } return (

Shopping Cart

{cartItems.length === 0 ? ( Your cart is empty Go Back ) : ( {cartItems.map((item) => ( {item.name} ${item.price} addToCartHandler(item, Number(e.target.value)) } > {[...Array(item.countInStock).keys()].map((x) => ( ))} ))} )}

Subtotal({cartItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.qty, 0)}) Items

$ {cartItems .reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.qty * item.price, 0) .toFixed()} ) } export default CartScreen
